document.full_text: an arizona death row inmate on friday lost an attempt to block his execution, when a u.s. appeals court ruled authorities can use a controversial drug next week for his lethal injection.
document.title: appeals court clears way for arizona execution
lines_and_colors: an arizona death row inmate on friday lost an attempt to block his execution, when a u.s. appeals court ruled authorities can use a controversial drug next week for his lethal injection.
